content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Maryam Abbasi from Iran. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Magdeburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: Hello Maryam, I'm glad we're talking about the rental price. I want to get the highest price possible for my apartment. Please make an offer.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because as a responsible person I'm looking to minimize costs while still getting a decent place to stay. TERMINATE
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran
